name: Black Magic Debug Probe
description: Used for debugging embedded applications running on an ARM STM32. This device is an Open Source product designed and built by Black Sphere Technologies and used by Greenstage for Tumanako software development. Full details are available here.

name: USB<->CAN bus
description:
Simple USB to CAN interface. This is an Open Source design manufactured by Greenstage for your convenience. Full details available from Mictronics. FYI - Here are some competing products (built using non open, proprietary technology):
  • www.can232.com
  • www.canusb.com

name: KiwiAC STM32MCU
description: The KiwiAC STM32MCU is a control board circuit with isolated IO and processing power suitable for high performance electric vehicle and motor control. The board utilises a ARM Cortex-M3 micro-controller to drive high power 3 phase induction motors via 200kW Semikron SKiiP and SKIA power stages. The STM32MCU is also suitable to drive brushless DC motors. For details see http://tumanako.net/STM32MCU The KiwiAC STM32MCU does not come with any software, but open source software is available from the Tumanako project.

name: LATA CAN bus controlled 10A 240V switches
description: A distributed control system that reduces the amount of mains cable required to wire the lighting system in most buildings, while providing features and benefits that are often technically difficult, or impossible to set-up. The LATA Control system is logical and straight forward to expand. Based on small modules which are positioned close to the fittings they control. The control circuits are wired using plug in pre-made cables or wired directly to the terminals on the modules. See http://www.jf2.co.nz for more information, or check out the Lata sourceforge project for all the open source project details.

name: SolarNode (standard)
description: This standalone SolarNode allows you to monitor and record your power generation online by joining the SolarNetwork. The standard SolarNode must be connected directly to one of the SolarNetwork's supported devices for data to be collected. Once connected, the SolarNode will allow your PV generated electricity to be captured in realtime (the SolarNode must be connected to your household Internet connection).

name: SolarNode kit (with wireless current sensor)
description: This SolarNode kit allows you to monitor and record your power consumption online by joining the SolarNetwork. The kit includes a current sensor that inductively hooks onto your houses power supply, this sensor wirelessly communicates with the SolarNode via a receiver allowing your power consumption to be captured in realtime (the SolarNode must be connected to your household Internet connection). Monitor your consumption online via any Internet connected web browser.

name: Charging Station
description: The Greenstage Charging Station includes SolarNetwork connectivity and provides charging via a variety of connectors, hence catering for a wide range of Electric Vehicles. The standard product includes a New Zealand 10 Amp 240V socket, a 16 Amp EN 60309 2P+E socket (commonly used in motor homes and camping grounds throughout NZ) and a 32 Amp capable J1772 connector. Other options are available on request. The Greenstage Charging Station requires installation by a registered electrician. Pricing does not include installation.

name: 100kW Scott Drive Inverter Only (for BLDC or Induction motors)
description:
This 100kW AC drive package is a purpose built EV inverter suitable for driving 3 phase permanent magnet motor (BLDC) and can now also be configured to drive inductions motors.

The Scott Drive AC Inverter includes built in DC contactor and precharge circuitry as well as 4 low power auxiliary motor drives for powering and controlling power steering and air conditioning pumps.

Specifications:
Pack voltages 200V to 425V DC
Power rating 100kW
Max DC current 450A
Inverter Dimensions: 380mm L x 300mm W x 105mm H

name: KiwiAC 200kVA SKAI Kit (Inverter only)
description: We have a limited number of KiwiAC 200kVA SKAI Kits available. The kit includes the following: 1 x SKAI 3001 GD12-1452W 1 x KiwiAC STM32MCU control board 1 x SKAI/KiwiAC connection cable The SKAI 3001 GD12-1452W is a 200 kVA Generation 1 SKAI module from Semikron. These modules are in as new condition (the modules have been previously installed and tested). The SKAI and KiwiAC STM32MCU control board come as separate units and the control board has SKAI module header pins and a ribbon cable for direct connection to the SKAI. All KiwiAC 200 kVA SKAI Kits have been tested with open source vehicle and motor control software from the Tumanako project and come pre-installed with STM32MCUtest (Tumanako's IO test software). This Kit is suitable for Electrical Engineers or experienced Electric Vehicle designers with software engineering and electrical engineering skills who need a starting point for custom high performance development projects. It is not in anyway suitable for use as a drop in solution for an Electric Vehicle.

name: KiwiAC 250kVA SKAI Kit (Inverter only)
description: KiwiAC 250kVA SKAI 2 Kits are now available. The kit includes the following: 1 x SKAI 45 A2 GD12-W12DI 1 x KiwiAC STM32MCU control board This inverter is a new 250 kVA Generation 2 SKAI module from Semikron. All KiwiAC 250 kVA SKAI Kits have been tested with open source vehicle and motor control software from the Tumanako project and come pre-installed with STM32MCUtest (Tumanako's IO test software). This Kit is suitable for Electrical Engineers or experienced Electric Vehicle designers with software engineering and electrical engineering skills who need a starting point for custom high performance development projects. It is not in anyway suitable for use as a drop in solution for an Electric Vehicle.

name: GS750V HCS
description: GS750V HCS is a purpose built high performance electric vehicle designed to compete in high intensity short duration motor sport events.  It's 10kWhr Lithium-Ion Nanophosphate battery pack ensures light weight, high performance and safety all in one.  Utilising the KiwiAC 200KVA Inverter and BMS systems this vehicle is built from the ground up to be no compromises vehicle.  If you care to road register your vehicle (NZ, Aus, Japan) and can keep your speeds at or below 100km/hr, you will enjoy single charge ranges in excess of 90km. You may even want to drive it to work!
